name: BaseballNightlyPick
0:
”Alexa, open baseball nightly pick and tell me what the game was today”
”Alexa, open baseball nightly pick and tell me the game today”
”Alexa, open baseball nightly pick and tell me the score of the nightly pick”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baseball nightly pick
des:
Reddit's /r/baseball Baseball Nightly Pick skill.
You can:
- Ask what the pick is/was today
- Ask what the score is/was of today's pick
